com.yahoo.prelude.templates

Class Template<T extends Writer>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.yahoo.prelude.templates.Template<T>

  • public abstract class Template<T extends Writer>
extends Object
    A template turns a template string and some state into an instantiated string. Add support for a particular template mechanism by subclassing this.
    Author:
    bratseth
